plot: Following the death of her father, Dotty Charles, her friend Dingle Bell, and her dog Fido travel around searching for work.
plot_en: Following the death of her father, Dotty Charles, her friend Dingle Bell, and her dog Fido travel around searching for work.
plot_es: Following the death of her father, Dotty Charles, her friend Dingle Bell, and her dog Fido travel around searching for work.
title: Two D's and a Dog
